accepted_if: Dole ne a karɓi :attribute lokacin :other shine :value.

after_or_equal: Dole ne :attribute ɗin ya zama kwanan wata bayan ko daidai da :date.
alpha: Dole ne :attribute ɗin ya ƙunshi haruffa kawai.

before: :attribute dole ne ya zama kwanan wata kafin :date.
before_or_equal: Dole ne :attribute ɗin su kasance kwanan wata kafin ko daidai da :date.

between.string: Dole ne :attribute ɗin ya kasance tsakanin haruffa :min zuwa :max.

contains: The :attribute field is missing a required value.

date: :attribute din ba kwanan wata ba ce.

declined_if: Dole ne a ƙi :attribute ɗin lokacin da :other ta kasance :value.

digits_between: Dole ne :attribute ɗin ya kasance tsakanin lambobi :min zuwa :max.

failed: Waɗannan takaddun shaida ba su dace da bayananmu ba.
file: Dole ne :attribute ɗin ya zama fayil.
